mapper.select: select user_no as userNo, user_id as userId, user_pw as userPw, user_phone as userPhone, user_email as userEmail, registration_number as userRegistration, introduce as userIntroduce, carrier_car as userCar, image_name as userImagePass, image_pass as userImageName, user_type as userType from user_tbl where user_id=#{userId} and user_pw=#{userPw}
